reviews.review: Das Spiel Half-Life 2 ist zusammen mit Garry's Mod und Team Fortress 2 meiner Meinung nach das allerbeste Ego-Shooter-Game was es gibt. Großes Lob an Valve für dieses wahnsinnig tolle Spiel. Die Reise von Gordon Freeman ist nicht einfach aber durchaus hervorragend zu spielen. Old but Gold ;)

soooo goooood

Now, let me open this review by saying that I freaking LOVE Half-Life! In case you think I've reviewed the wrong game, do not despair, I haven't, it's just I feel I need to share this declaration in order to set the foundation of this review. Right, let's get to it. After the HUGE success of Half-Life I was genuinely overwhelmed by the announcement that a sequel would be coming out. I’ve played HL2 when it was first released in 2004 and again recently. So, what did a fan (huge fan) of Half-Life think?

Confused.
You begin as Gordon Freeman having just arrived in City 17, from where you don't know and never do. A figure on a screen is broadcasting, a person whose name, once learnt has no meaning to you. The city and indeed the world has been conquered by a force called the Combine. Who they are or why they invaded is never explained (at least in no detail). You meet up with three colleagues from Black Mesa. One is Barney who we know escaped the facility before its destruction. The other two were last seen deep within Black Mesa yet here they are, alive and once again no explanation is given. This theme continues through the game, causing me to constantly scratch my head in thought. Only by reading online did I learn what the hell HL2 was all about, something that I should never have had to do.
Graphically HL2 was a huge improvement on HL, yet by today’s standards dated and lacking features that one would expect in a FPS. Weapons are your usual standard, with one exception. Enemies are varied including some old favourites.

I can't help but feel that HL2 was (and is) an incomplete game story wise. For me HL2 was not HL. Other than Gordon Freeman and the occasional G-man scene it felt nothing like the original, which was (and is) so good. The only level which reminded me of HL was Ravenholme, a rather scary place. I get the feeling that the developers, after the huge success of HL thought they'd make a sequel but had no idea what story to go with, no idea what to do as most scientists etc were killed in the original. There is no continuous flow from HL to HL2. It was not seamless. It was disjointed and full of storyline holes. As I didn't know who anyone was I found myself not caring what happened to them. I played through the game emotionless, uncaring and confused.

7/10

Was i moron enough for not playing this game `til now ? - Yes.

Was i moron enough for buying the game but not playing it  ? - Yes and no. Because i supported the devs for a great game that i didn`t knew it was a great game.

Was i moron enough for playing this game ? - Yes. Because i like it very much and i`ll develop an addiction to it. And no. Because that`s how i tell that the devs did a good job. Like a priest succeding in converting you from atheism into belief.

9.5/10 - Because you never know when you need to be moron enough.

游戏的剧情人设画面以及游戏体验是我见过最棒的之一，高度拟人的NPC以及逼真的物理引擎让人赞叹。valve公司的作品的确是经典。现在也玩过了cs,求生之路，军团要塞，传送门。这些游戏给了我很深的印象。

如果大家不知道接下来玩什么，不如试试半条命系列吧。

This game doesn't need an introduction. 

Being one of the best single player adventures, hopefully with a long awaited (do not count on it though....) second sequal (HL3), this game is a flagship game, and a signature mark of Valve. Whilst the multiplayer version of the game isn't all that solid (not very balanced imo), the game on it's own is something of legendary value. The campaign itself is something that must be experienced, that's how good it is. You can't miss it if you adore FPS shooters at any rate. At all. 

No words.

I just cant believe how old this game is ! It's impossible ! How could I miss this for so long !? Dont think about it twice, just buy it.

10/10, no brainer.

When I first played this game I was completely new to the Half-Life universe, and hardly knew about vitally important plot points from the first game. I had no idea why the Combine had invaded Earth, I didn't know what Barney meant by "Just like old times". 

Depite this, Half-Life 2 was still the most immersive story-driven games I had every played. I didn't know these characters, but I didn't need to in order to connect with them, and I didn't need to know the origin of the setting to understand my actions within the game.

Story related tangents aside, the gameplay here is fantasitc. The limited maximum ammo forces the player to use their entire arsenal, whereas if Half-Life, the ammo capacity was so large you could go the entire game only using about 5 weapons of your huge arsenal. The enemy placement is also great. There are largescale firefights where you are pitted against several enemies, but they're positioned in a way that prevents you from being easily overpowered.

Of course, you also have the joy that is the gravity gun. There are some areas where it is mostly ineffecitve, but in the right place, it is an absolute blast to launch whatever objects might being lying around at your foes, as well as having a makeshift shield wherever there happens to be any props.

I'd reccomend playing on Normal for a casual experience, and Hard if you're looking for a decent challenge. Easy can be fun if you feel like going on a completely uninterrupted rampage, but I personally don't find that totally exciting.

Overall I think this is a game everyone with a steam account should play, along with the rest of the games in the series.
Your life is only half complete before you play this.

Ama Hiç Düşündünüzmü Bu Oyunun Kötü Yanlarını (Not:Hikayeyi Oyunu Bitirenler Okusun SPOİLER İÇERİR)
Başlayalım Hikayeden:Şimdi Burda Hikayeyi Anlatsam 2 saatimi alır o yüzden sadece hl2 (half life 2) de geçen senaryoyu anlatıcam ilk başta bir metroda başlıyoruz g-man bizimle konuşuyor ilerliyoruz felan Barney'in yardımıyla kaçıyoruz orda combineler bizi kıstırıp dövüyor tam o anda alxy (eli vance'nin kızı) bizi kurtarıyor ve nerdeyse oyunda hep yanımızda olan bir karakterle karşılaşıyoruz bizi Dr.Kleiner'in yanına götürüyo orda Barney'ide görüyoruz  bizi H.E.V Suitimize kavuşturuyolar sonra eli vance nin yanına gitmek için yeni üretilmiş olan ışınlayıcıdan geçiyoruz ve eli'nin yanına gitmek isterken lamar(dişleri sökülmüş zararsız headcrab) gelip üstümüze atlıyo ve makinayı bozuyo birkaçkere rastgele ışınlandıktan sonra o binanın arkasına ışınlanıyoruz barney bize levyemizi veriyor ve ordan sonrası Ölüm makinası gordon freemanın combine'ler ile imtihanı ordan sonra tek amacımız eli vance'nin kurduğu (en azından ben öyle biliyorum) mekana gitmek zombilerle savaşıyoz bot bulup sürerek gidiyoruz napıb ne edip gidiyoruz ve orda bize eli vance'nin üretmiş olduğu gravity gun veriliyor tabi ondan önce alxy yi görüyoruz eli'yi dr.mossman'ı görüyoruz sohbet geçiyor aralarında sonra gravity gunı veriyolar bize alıştırma yaparken DOG (alxy nin robot köpeğini) görüyoruz ama çok tatlı lan :D:D neyse alıştırmadan sonra combineler binayı basıyor ve kaçıyoruz bizde alxy den ayrılıp felan orda bir kilise mekanına gidiyoruz orda father grogi (belki adını yanlış yazmışımdır) ile karşılaşıyoruz bize yol gösteriyo ordan ayrılıyoruz felan bundan sonrası hep combine öldürme zombi öldürme felan sonradan bize araba veriyolar combine yerine sızıyoruz felan filan (tabi baya episode atladım oralarda pek bir hikaye dönmüyo istiyosanız alın oynayın görün) orda dr.mossman'ın ajan olduğunu öğreniyoruz ve bu arada eli vance kaçırılıyor biz onları ararken birden dışarı çıkıyoruz orda barney ve birliğine yardım ediyoruz combine ile olan savaşta sonra dog bizi biyere götürüyo yine combine yerlerine giriyoruz sonra bir şeye oturup gidiyoruz (birşey dediğim pod bilen bilir) yanlışlıkla dr.breen (bu city 17 nin başkanı oyunun başındada gözükür) orda gravity gun umuz super charged oluyor (böyle canlı insanları tutuyor felan fena birşey) sonra dr.mossman birden bize yardım ediyo kurtuluyoruz (tabi alxy ve eli de bizim yanımızda onuda kurtarıyo mossman) sonra dr.breen kaçarken bize gravity gun ile vuruyo uyandığımızda alxy ile onu arıyoruz kaçıyo bizden gravity gun ı bırakıyo ama işte çekirdek felan patlatıyoz en sonunda bir geçit var onu patlatıyoruz kocaman patlama oluyo tam biz patlicakken zaman duruyo g-man geliyo konuşuyo ama ne dediğini söylemicam en havalı yer spoiler yemek istemezsiniz sonra bizi biyere hapsediyo ve bitiyo oyun zaten hl2 ep 1 de o uzaylılar (bizden olan uzaylılar) bişey yapıp bizi kurtarıyo g-man'ın elinden öyle başlıyo...

HALF-LIFE 2.
Gra-legenda, na jej sukces według mnie składa się kilka czynników, ale szczególnie zachwyca mnie mechanika, te całe strzelanie, bieganie, skakanie... odlot!
Uwielbiam tę grę, zapewne jak większość ludzi, którzy w nią zagrali choć raz.
A więc wymienię jeszcze plusy i minusy gry.
PLUSY:
- Świetna (według mnie) mechanika (tak, wiem, powtarzam się :D )
- Grafika - mało wymagająca gra, potrafi momentami zachwycić
- Fabuła - część osób nie zwraca na nią uwagi, lecz upominam - WARTO! :)
- Długość fabuły, przez co gra staje się wciągająca.
Można jeszcze dodać, że gra w jakiś sposób rozwija ciekawość, bo jak wiadomo jest do niej przypisane osiągnięcie "Lokalizator Lambda", w którym to musimy znaleźć czasami bardzo utajnione/ukryte miejsca i podnieść z nich coś/dokonać czegoś. W każdym z takich miejsc znajduje się charakterystyczny znak (litera) Lambda na ścianie/elemencie otoczenia.
Małym minusem według mnie jest czasami niezrównoważony poziom trudności, zaczynającym przygodę z Half-Life zalecam zacząć od średniego/trudnego (w miarę umiejętności), a dopiero później rozważać zmianę poziomu trudności na niższy.
Ogólna ocena to oczywiście "dycha", gra zasługuje na to nie tylko samym byciem grą, ale również swoją już (można powiedzieć) legendarnością.
Serdecznie zapraszam do zakupu gry jak i dodatków, bo gwarantuję - nie zawiedziecie się :)

Sequel del celeberrimo Half Life con una veste grafica decisamente migliorata grazie al rendering di Source capace di creare un sistema di animazione facciale avanzato e ambienti dettagliati e realistici; in poche parole sorprendente. Eccellente anche l'audio e la colonna sonora. Ottima giocabilità. Trama avvincente degna del primo. Consigliatissimo agli amanti del genere.
